alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:48AM EST until December 19 at 6:23AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walloomsac River at Bennington. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water is almost to road level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 8.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Walloomsac River Bennington Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 8 am: 5.0 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 7.1 Mon 7 pm 8.7 Tue 1 am 6.8 Tue 7 am 4.8 Tue 1 pm 4.1 Tue 7 pm 3.8 Wed 1 am 3.6 Wed 7 am 3.4 Wed 1 pm 3.2 Wed 7 pm 3.1 Thu 1 am 3.0 &&
